column4: I just set up my own chat server and it works great however I cannot op myself? Sounds funny but I was wondering if anyone knows how I can go about this? I looked at my config files but don't see anything there and have been searching the internet much with no luck
depends on the ircd you have
for example you cant op yourself on IRCnet networks

I just checked. I have ircd-irc2 installed. I can connect to my computer on the standard port. Everything seems to work however it is like the server is not mine. Do you know of any documents I can read up on this? I basically would like to hide my ip when I am on my server and have op status.
